title: By the King a proclamation signifying the Kings Maiesties pleasure, touching the resort of people to his coronation.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,
notes: For precautions against the plague, during the coronation of James I.
Giuen at our Castle of Windsor, the sixt day of Iuly, 1603. in the first yeere of our Reigne of England, France and Ireland, and of Scotland the six and thirtieth."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
